note.p: Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1942-1944 vol 4 pp 507-522, plate, by G P Lenox-Conyngham

References: R Singh and F Riess, 'The nobel laureate Sir Chandrasekhara Venkata Raman FRS and his contacts with the British Scientific community in a social and political context' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 47-64
Notes: DNB is cited as a source in index to BR; but relevant entry could not be located.
